queries.sql: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS iblogg CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `users` ( `user_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_name` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `user_email` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `user_avatar` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'assets/img/user.jpg', `user_role` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user', `user_password` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user', `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME, CONSTRAINT `pk_users` PRIMARY KEY(`user_id`), UNIQUE KEY `user_name` (`user_name`), UNIQUE KEY `user_email` (`user_email`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `settings` ( `id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `user_settings` TEXT NOT NULL, `file_settings` TEXT NOT NULL, `post_settings` TEXT NOT NULL, `comment_settings` TEXT NOT NULL, `site_settings` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `files` ( `file_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `file_uploader_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `file_path` TEXT NOT NULL, `file_size` INT NOT NULL, `file_type` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, `file_ext` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME, CONSTRAINT `pk_files` PRIMARY KEY(`file_id`), CONSTRAINT `files_file_uploader_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY(`file_uploader_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `roles` ( `role_id` INT(11) NOT NULL UNIQUE, `role_name` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME NOT NULL ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `posts` ( `post_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `post_title` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, `post_slug` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, `post_body` TEXT NOT NULL, `post_thumbnail` VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'uploads/post-thumbnail.jpg', `post_type` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'post', `poster_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME, CONSTRAINT `pk_posts` PRIMARY KEY(`post_id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `comments` ( `comment_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `comment_author` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `author_ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `comment_body` TEXT NOT NULL, `post_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME, CONSTRAINT `pk_comments` PRIMARY KEY(`comment_id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci
SELECT `user_id`, `user_name`, `user_role`, `user_password` FROM `users` WHERE `user_role` = 'admin' AND `user_name` = 'Admin' OR `user_email` = 'Admin' AND `users`.`deleted_at` IS NULL LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `users` (`user_name`, `user_email`, `user_role`, `user_password`, `user_avatar`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('Admin', 'adminemail@walkify.blog', 'admin', '$2y$10$w/625luJkj1GTOQxZaXmV.nksBv54ttBJbDwjCq5V3iGOZyMEjWWW', 'uploads/user.jpg', '2020-10-18 05:17:06', '2020-10-18 05:17:06')
SELECT * FROM `settings` WHERE `settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `settings`.`id` = 1

INSERT INTO `settings` (`post_settings`, `file_settings`, `user_settings`, `comment_settings`, `site_settings`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('{\"user_posts_per_page\":\"6\",\"usersrch_posts_per_page\":\"6\",\"admin_posts_per_page\":\"10\"}', '{\"files_per_page\":\"6\"}', '{\"admin_user_per_page\":\"8\"}', '{\"user_comments_per_page\":\"10\", \"admin_comments_per_page\":\"10\"}', '{\"site_tagline\" : \"A simple blog running on walkify and codeigniter\", \"page_position\" : \"top\"}', '2020-10-18 05:17:06', '2020-10-18 05:17:06')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM `posts` WHERE `posts`.`deleted_at` IS NULL

INSERT INTO `posts` (`post_title`, `post_slug`, `post_body`, `poster_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('iBlogg Default Post', 'iblogg-default-post', 'Hello, This is a post generated dynamically login to admin panel to delete or edit this post.', 1, '2020-10-18 05:17:06', '2020-10-18 05:17:06')

INSERT INTO `posts` (`post_title`, `post_slug`, `post_type`, `post_body`, `poster_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('about', 'about', 'page', 'About page generated dynamically login to admin panel to delete or edit this page.', 1, '2020-10-18 05:17:06', '2020-10-18 05:17:06')

INSERT INTO `posts` (`post_title`, `post_slug`, `post_type`, `post_body`, `poster_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('contact', 'contact', 'page', 'Contact page generated dynamically login to admin panel to delete or edit this page.', 1, '2020-10-18 05:17:06', '2020-10-18 05:17:06')

INSERT INTO `comments` (`comment_author`, `author_ip`, `comment_body`, `post_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('Admin', '::1', 'iBlogg default comment. this comment can deleted in Admin panel', 1, '2020-10-18 05:17:06', '2020-10-18 05:17:06')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM `roles` WHERE `roles`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
INSERT INTO `roles` (`role_id`, `role_name`) VALUES (1,'admin'), (2,'mod'), (3,'user')
SELECT `post_settings` FROM `settings` WHERE `settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
SELECT `site_settings` FROM `settings` WHERE `settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM `posts` WHERE `post_type` = 'post' AND `posts`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
SELECT * FROM `posts` WHERE `post_type` = 'post' AND `posts`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `posts`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `post_id` DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM `posts` WHERE `posts`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
SELECT * FROM `posts` WHERE `post_type` = 'page' AND `posts`.`deleted_at` IS NULL
